verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%> more <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he will let you <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H4480>hence:<s%> <S%H2088><s%> when he shall let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> he shall surely thrust you <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4480>hence<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3617>altogether.<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and let every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and every <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> her <S%H7468>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> <S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> About <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the <S%H4480>firstborn<s%> <S%H1060><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H8198>maidservant<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7347>mill;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>beasts.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> like <S%H3644>it,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall be like <S%H3644>it<s%> any <S%H3254>more.<s%>

But against <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H2782>move<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> against <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H929>beast:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth put a <S%H6395>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and bow down <S%H7812>themselves<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Get thee <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H859><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7272>follow<s%> thee: and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%> I will go <S%H3318>out.<s%> And he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in a <S%H2750>great<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you; <S%H4616>that<s%> my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> so that he would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>
